caption.title: Spot identification in Taenia solium cysticercus culture 2D-PAGE gels.
caption.p: (A) 2D PAGE. (B) Conserved spots are marked in green (a conserved spot is one that is found in at least two different cultures). (C) Differential spots are marked in blue (a differential spot is one that is found in only one culture); isoelectric point (IP), culture 1 (C1), culture 2 (C2), culture 3 (C3), culture 4 (C4), and culture 5 (C5).
